issue.title: [C++] Clean up includes in exec_plan.h
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-17109](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-17109). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Notably, it includes logging.h transitively via exec/util.h which we should avoid. We should perhaps add to/create an arrow/compute/exec/type_fwd.h
